PLAVEBAPPS is a Los Angeles, California based firm which specializes in mobile and web design & development services. The developers and designers working with the company are well-versed in various technologies and use their expertise to provide feature-rich, competitive solutions to the clients.
PLAVEB emphasizes on quality above everything else and updates its knowledge from time to time to use only the latest technology in client projects; it adheres to the industry standards and follows a focused approach in all its projects. This reflects in all its applications, be it for the web or for various mobile platforms such as iOS and Android, which it develops for the clients.
